definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Standards for drinking water have been improved continuously.
sentences.chinese: 饮用水水质标准不断进行完善。

sentences.english: The Environmental Protection Agency does not regulate manganese under the Safe Drinking Water Act.
sentences.chinese: 环境保护机构没有按照安全饮用水法案规范锰的含量。

sentences.english: Landfills can contaminate drinking-water if they not properly constructed.
sentences.chinese: 废渣填埋地如果构建不当则可能污染饮用水。

sentences.english: We distilled the salt water and made it into drinking water.
sentences.chinese: 我们蒸馏海水使其变成饮用水。

sentences.english: Lorca Mayor asked local supermarkets to provide food and drinking water to the victims.
sentences.chinese: 洛尔卡市市长要求当地超市向灾民提供食品和饮用水。

sentences.english: Relief workers unload crates of bottled water in Car Nicobar.
sentences.chinese: 救援工作人员从飞机上搬下装满饮用水的集装箱。

sentences.english: He said they had provided food and drink and had been polite.
sentences.chinese: 他说军方为他们提供了食物和饮用水并且很有礼貌。

sentences.english: Taken for a Fluoride Should we be fluoridating our drinking water?
sentences.chinese: 对氟化物采取行动应该在饮用水里头加氟化物吗？

sentences.english: A great proportion of these cases can be attributed to contamination of food and drinking water.
sentences.chinese: 这些病例的大部分可归应于食品和饮用水污染。

sentences.english: In fact, it's cleaner even than that and could easily be made drinkable.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，它甚至干净到可以很容易地被制成饮用水。

sentences.english: If you have well water, get it tested every year.
sentences.chinese: 如果你获得满意的饮用水，每年都检测一下。

sentences.english: It is claimed that soap powders pollute the water we drink.
sentences.chinese: 据说肥皂粉污染了我们的饮用水。

sentences.english: The undefiled water is the foundation of public health.
sentences.chinese: 洁净的饮用水是人类健康的保障。

sentences.english: China will continue to carry out well-drilling and water supply projects in Africa to provide safe drinking water for the African people.
sentences.chinese: 继续援助打井供水项目，为民众提供安全饮用水。

sentences.english: Visitors can drink free and clean water every 100 meters.
sentences.chinese: 每隔100米既有免费卫生的饮用水提供。

definition: water source/water supply/headwaters of a river
water intake/to obtain water (from a well etc)
potable water (water with low salt content)/fresh water
Danshui or Tanshui town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
